jobs_results.title: Junior iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
OVERVIEW

As one of iOS developers in Sportradar's Mobile Unit your responsibility will be to develop iOS Mobile applications with superior UX for the sport fans worldwide.

THE CHALLENGE

‚Ä¢ Develop state-of-the-art iOS mobile applications leveraging Sportradar‚Äôs data.

‚Ä¢ Use newest development principles and frameworks recommended.

‚Ä¢ Cooperate with designers, testers and other developers to meet the required goals.

YOUR PROFILE

‚Ä¢ Experience with native iOS development (desired Swift, extra points for SwiftUI).

‚Ä¢ You understand basic development standards and concepts.

‚Ä¢ You understand architectural approaches of designing iOS Mobile app.

‚Ä¢ You are aware that unit tests make your life easier in the long term.

‚Ä¢ You are always on the look for new technologies and are eager to try them out.

‚Ä¢ You are fluent in English.

OUR OFFER

‚Ä¢ A collaborative environment with colleagues from all over the world (Engineering offices in Europe, Asia and US).

‚Ä¢ Ability to shape your own workday and career via a clearly defined professional and personal development plan.

‚Ä¢ Opportunity to work with senior leadership team and develop yourself within an inspiring and fast-growing company.

‚Ä¢ Vibrant and inclusive community, including Women in Tech and Pride groups which welcome all participants.

‚Ä¢ Hybrid work model.

‚Ä¢ New office with several additional benefits.

At Sportradar, we celebrate our diverse group of hardworking employees. Sportradar is committed to ensuring equal access to its programs, facilities, and employment opportunities. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteran. We encourage you to apply even if you only meet most of the requirements (but not 100% of the listed criteria) ‚Äì we believe skills evolve over time. If you‚Äôre willing to learn and grow with us, we invite you to join our team!

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer (Remote)
jobs_results.description:
üöÄ What's the position?

This is a Full-time Senior iOS Developer position at Neybox for talented individuals who want to work on cutting-edge applications that positively impact the well-being of individuals worldwide.

üí´ What will I be working on?

You'll be working on our two apps: Pillow, a sleep-tracking app, and Today, which is a quantified-self wellness app.

Both apps have won an Editors' Choice distinction and have been featured multiple times in press and media. They have millions of users worldwide and a great roadmap ahead.

üßë‚Äçüíª What will be my role and responsibilities?

As a senior developer you will be responsible for
‚Ä¢ Building new features
‚Ä¢ Fixing bugs
‚Ä¢ Maintaining the existing codebase
‚Ä¢ Writting Unit Tests for existing and new features
‚Ä¢ Making sure the documentation of the project is accurate and helpful
‚Ä¢ Doing research on new technologies and frameworks
‚Ä¢ ‚ö†Ô∏èThis is a position that requires a commitment of 40 hours per week. This is not a part-time position.

üõ†Ô∏è What's the tech stack?

In a nutshell:

Both our apps are written in Swift (MVVM and MVC).

The UI is written in SwiftUI and UIKit.

We write Unit Tests; the code is clean and well-documented.

We make extensive use of various frameworks and machine learning.

Both apps are available for iOS only.

üåç Can I work remotely?

Of course! Our team is 100% remote. We have flexible working hours, but a good overlap between our time zones is required.

üôå What is it like working at Neybox?

Our team is small by design (6-8 people). However, we work closely together every day (Mon-Fri). For coordination, we use Slack and Jira and keep meetings at a minimum.

There's no middle management to get in the way, and we encourage new ideas and close collaboration.

üíº What are the requirements?
‚Ä¢ 4+ years of iOS development experience in Swift
‚Ä¢ Experience in HealthKit, CoreML SwiftUI, UIKit, Core Animation, GCD, Core Data, and WatchKit.
‚Ä¢ Experience working with Git version control, Unit testing, and Continuous Integration
‚Ä¢ Experience in performance profiling with Instruments on Xcode.
‚Ä¢ Proficient use of English, both writing and speaking.
‚Ä¢ Willingness to learn and experiment with new technologies.
‚Ä¢ References from previous employers in written or spoken form may be required from previous employers.
‚Ä¢ Proficient in usage of MacOS and iOS.

üì• Great! How can I apply?

Just hit "Apply" button below!

‚ö†Ô∏è Please note that this is the only acceptable way to apply. All other ways of contacting Neybox about the position (social media, LinkedIn, email etc.), will result in immediate rejection.

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer - Spanish/English - Full Remote
Software (mobile) Engineer
jobs_results.description:
Job Responsibilities

As a Mobile Developer, you will:
‚Ä¢ Be an active member of an agile development team, collaborating with product managers, designers, and QA specialists.
‚Ä¢ Design, develop, and maintain product, ensuring secure and scalable transaction processing.
‚Ä¢ Implement new features and enhance existing functionality while meeting performance and regulatory requirements.
‚Ä¢ Write clean, maintainable, and secure code in compliance with industry standards.
‚Ä¢ Conduct code reviews and develop unit tests to uphold software quality and security.
‚Ä¢ Troubleshoot complex issues, debug code, and optimize the app to improve the user experience.
‚Ä¢ Focus on security and compliance with regulatory requirements for trading and data storage.

What We Expect

Technical Skills:
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in React Native and TypeScript
for mobile application development.
‚Ä¢ Experience with native development for iOS
(Objective-C/Swift) and Android (Java/Kotlin).
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with Redux and RxJS
for state management and reactive programming.
‚Ä¢ Expertise in version control systems like Git.
‚Ä¢ Hands-on experience with testing frameworks such as Jest or Detox.

Knowledge and Experience:
‚Ä¢ Understanding of mobile development principles, best practices, and user experience (UI/UX) optimization.
‚Ä¢ Analytical problem-solving skills for debugging and improving applications.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with finance, trading, or cryptocurrency is a plus.

What We Offer You
‚Ä¢ The chance to work in the exciting and rapidly growing Crypto & Digital Assets sector.
‚Ä¢ A dynamic role with opportunities for professional growth and development.
‚Ä¢ Salary range from 4.000 - 6.000+ monthly.
‚Ä¢ Learning and development budget with ample possibilities for growth.
‚Ä¢ Access to cutting-edge equipment.
‚Ä¢ Regular team events fostering a collaborative environment.
‚Ä¢ Office located near Kranj Slovenia.
‚Ä¢ Option for partial remote work - 3/4 times per week.
‚Ä¢ 30 days of paid vacation.

jobs_results.title: Flutter Mobile Developer
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Europe, Portugal

The role is restricted to those physically located in Europe, while this is a remote position, we cannot consider candidates that are not based in such region. Preference will be given to candidates based in Portugal, Spain or Malta.

We are looking for an enthusiastic Flutter Mobile Developer to help maintain and develop our sports mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ As a Flutter Mobile Developer you are expected to ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¢ Write clean, well-documented, and maintainable code for Flutter application
‚Ä¢ Develop and maintain technical documentation for the applications
‚Ä¢ Identify the causes of the most complex issues and implement practical and efficient technical solutions
‚Ä¢ Implement both backend and front-end features
‚Ä¢ Coordinate with UX/UI designers, developers, and test engineers in an Agile environment
‚Ä¢ Abide by industry and company software development standards
‚Ä¢ Conduct code reviews and give feedback to other developers
‚Ä¢ Understand the big picture and offer insightful advice about technologies and projects
‚Ä¢ Be proactive in identifying and communicating potential risks and issues to the team and stakeholders
‚Ä¢ Participate in sprint planning, estimation, and retrospective meetings
‚Ä¢ Keep up-to-date with the latest mobile app development trends and technologies
‚Ä¢ Work in close partnership with cross-functional teams and management
‚Ä¢ Ensure code quality by writing tests, using SonarQube, etc.
‚Ä¢ Success in this role means...
‚Ä¢ Collaborating towards a team effort to improve the overall user experience of our applications.
‚Ä¢ Developing DRY, clean, maintainable and scalable code that can be comprehended and worked on solely through documentation created.
‚Ä¢ Increasing the performance, scalability and security of our mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ You have acquired proficient communication skills in the English language through team collaboration.

This offer from "Raketech" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 86% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Middle/Senior Mobile Flutter Software Engineers
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Europe, Belarus, Poland, Kazakhstan

We are looking for experienced Middle/Senior Mobile Flutter Software Engineers to join our core product ‚Äì BOSS Revolution.

You have a chance to work with a team of outstanding professionals on a challenging product.

You will never be bored‚Äîour team is dynamic, as are our products. Be ready to face thrilling professional challenges and use your strong hard and soft skills to solve them as a Team player.

Your primary responsibility is end-to-end development and support of our user experience in our customer-facing apps.

Join us if you want to:
‚Ä¢ Have a unique work experience with a really strong engineering team!
‚Ä¢ Become a part of a multinational and cross-functional team.
‚Ä¢ Boost your career with a big international product company and have new growth opportunities.
‚Ä¢ Work on new innovative features and bug fixes in a Scrum Team.
‚Ä¢ Take responsibility for the full software development life-cycle.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with business stakeholders and be a part of the product development team.
‚Ä¢ Demonstrate your technology-agnostic positive attitude with the ability to learn and desire to implement solutions using various technologies.
‚Ä¢ Work on high-performing, mission-critical, scalable, and resilient applications and services.
‚Ä¢ Drive aggressive technical debt reduction in close collaboration with developers and automation test engineers.
Join us, if you have:
‚Ä¢ Have around one year of Flutter cross-platform development experience.
‚Ä¢ Have 5+ years of hands-on mobile development experience (Android and/or iOS).
‚Ä¢ Are truly passionate about mobile development.
‚Ä¢ Can communicate in English (B2+).
‚Ä¢ Are a constant learner.
You can please us with:
‚Ä¢ Experience in configuring mobile CI pipelines.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge and experience beyond mobile stack.
We offer you:
‚Ä¢ An exciting and challenging job with talented people around.
‚Ä¢ Really good hardware (a laptop with 32 GB RAM and 512 GB SSD).
‚Ä¢ Competitive salary and growth opportunities.
‚Ä¢ Remote work opportunity (with the opportunity to work from offices in Minsk and Warsaw).
‚Ä¢ Superb English lessons.A few words about us:

IDT Corporation is a global communications company founded in 1990 and headquartered in Newark, New Jersey. We are industry leaders in prepaid communication and payment services and one of the largest international voice carriers. We are listed on the NYSE, employ over 1800 people across 20 countries, and have over $1.5 billion in revenues.

We are not ‚Äùanother big IT corporation‚Äù‚Äî we encourage and support in-house entrepreneurs in developing their ideas into business actions.

Our flagship brand, Boss Revolution, offers Money Transfer, International Calling, and Mobile Top-Up services and supports IDT‚Äôs mission of enabling people to keep in touch and share resources with family and friends worldwide.

If you are here, it seems like you are interested, so let‚Äôs chat! üòâ

This offer from "IDT Corporation" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 77% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Senior Developer Advocate
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: United States, EMEA

About us:

RevenueCat makes building, analyzing, and growing mobile subscriptions easy. We launched as part of Y Combinator's summer 2018 batch and today are handling more than $4B of in-app purchases annually across thousands of apps.

We are a mission driven, remote-first company that is building the standard for mobile subscription infrastructure. Top apps like VSCO, Notion, and ClassDojo count on RevenueCat to power their subscriptions at scale.

Our 80 team members (and growing!) are located all over the world, from San Francisco to Madrid to Taipei. We're a close-knit, product-driven team, and we strive to live our core values: Customer Obsession, Always Be Shipping, Own It, and Balance.

The Role

RevenueCat helps apps of all shapes and sizes make more money across mobile, the web, and other platforms like Roku and Amazon. As a result, many different types of users log in to ‚Äì and use ‚Äì RevenueCat on a day-to-day basis. Product managers, support reps, lifecycle marketers, user acquisition specialists, data analysts, executives: The list goes on.

None of those users would make it onto RevenueCat unless a developer implements it first. And for smaller apps, developers are these users: They do the marketing, provide support, interpret the performance data, make pricing and packaging decisions, and more.

We‚Äôre looking for a Senior Developer Advocate to help ensure these developers are successful when using RevenueCat. You‚Äôd join forces with our current Advocate, and guy you might have seen walking around Seoul in the rain, Charlie Chapman. We‚Äôre specifically looking for someone with strong skills in producing written educational content targeted at developers that is technical but engaging. Your work will educate existing RevenueCat users, attract new search traffic, and position RevenueCat as the go-to resource when implementing in-app purchases across platforms.

What you‚Äôll be responsible for

Your primary responsibility will be creating high-quality, developer-focused content focused on monetization and in-app purchases. This includes both scenarios where developers use RevenueCat to solve for these use cases, as well as alternative implementations.

Examples of the type of content we‚Äôd expect you to produce include blogpost with titles like:
‚Ä¢ "Migrating a native subscription app to Flutter: A step by step plan"
‚Ä¢ "Implementing your first subscription with RevenueCat: Disable ads for paid users"
‚Ä¢ "How to detect and highlight the platform of purchase for cross-device subscribers"
‚Ä¢ "Adding a multi-tier subscription to your Expo app"

In addition to writing, you‚Äôll:
‚Ä¢ Speak at conferences, webinars, and other events to share insights and represent RevenueCat
‚Ä¢ Record videos and collaborate on webinars to help developers implement and succeed with RevenueCat
‚Ä¢ Work cross-functionally to develop resources that support developers using RevenueCat

Within the first month, you‚Äôll:
‚Ä¢ Learn RevenueCat inside and out
‚Ä¢ Familiarize yourself with our developer community and how to engage them
‚Ä¢ Have produced your first pieces of RevenueCat content

Within the first 3 months, you‚Äôll:
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with Charlie on a joint content strategy playing to both your strengths
‚Ä¢ Independently research and develop content to fill current gaps in our documentation and other educational efforts
‚Ä¢ Repurpose existing content into new formats (e.g., blog posts into videos) to expand our reach

Within the first 6 months, you‚Äôll:
‚Ä¢ Represent RevenueCat at industry conferences and webinars, delivering talks and engaging with developers
‚Ä¢ Support product launches with technical content (written or video)

After 12 months, you‚Äôll have:
‚Ä¢ Become a fixture across the developer community, having become synonymous with RevenueCat and in-app monetization for Android, Flutter, and/or React Native
‚Ä¢ Found new and novel ways to help us engage developers (think Shipaton, App Store Rejection socks, and similar initiatives)

About you

You‚Äôre passionate about teaching and helping developers thrive. You‚Äôre deeply experienced in app development, particularly subscription apps, whether as part of a team or through indie projects (preferably both).

What you‚Äôll need to be successful
‚Ä¢ 5+ years of experience in app development or developer-focused roles, ideally in a subscription app environment, with a deep understanding of at least one major mobile development platform (Android, Flutter, React Native preferred; iOS a strong alternative) and the ability to learn and write about others
‚Ä¢ Strong independent project management skills, with the ability to manage multiple content initiatives, events, and deadlines across time zones without constant oversight
‚Ä¢ Excellent technical communication skills, capable of translating complex technical concepts into accessible and engaging written, video, and spoken formats for developers
‚Ä¢ A passion for teaching and empowering developers, with the ability to create content that educates and inspires action, including blog posts, tutorials, and videos
‚Ä¢ Proven ability to learn and explain new technologies, with expertise in Android development, Flutter, or React Native preferred (experience with iOS development is a plus if paired with a demonstrated ability to adapt to and write about other platforms)
‚Ä¢ Proven experience in producing content for a developer audience, preferably in a professional capacity as a developer advocate, but we‚Äôd consider exceptional candidates that have written, recorded video, and have spoken at conferences targeted at developers as a hobby or side-project
‚Ä¢ Resourcefulness and adaptability, with a problem-solving mindset to navigate the challenges of engaging a global developer community
‚Ä¢ Outcome-driven approach, ensuring your efforts lead to measurable impacts, such as increased content engagement, developer onboarding, and community growth
‚Ä¢ Comfort with a fully remote, asynchronous work environment, and tools like Notion, Zoom, Slack, and Linear. You‚Äôll need to thrive in an environment that balances collaboration with ample time for focused, deep work

We‚Äôre looking for someone who embodies our team‚Äôs core values of agency and intellectual curiosity: taking initiative, solving problems, and continually learning to better serve our diverse developer audience. Regular travel may occasionally be required for conferences, events, or team gatherings.

What we offer:
‚Ä¢ $212,000 USD salary, regardless of location
‚Ä¢ Competitive equity in a fast-growing, Series C startup backed by top-tier investors, including Y Combinator
‚Ä¢ 10-year window to exercise vested equity options
‚Ä¢ Fully remote and flexible work environment
‚Ä¢ 4-5 weeks of suggested time off annually for mental, physical, and emotional recharge
‚Ä¢ $2,000 USD for workspace setup and $1,000 USD annual stipend for continuous learning

Curious about the interview process? Discover more in our blog post about how we hire and learn tips to help you succeed.

This offer from "RevenueCat" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 90% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Senior Mobile Cross-Platform Developer (Firebase)
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: EMEA

About us:

Talent has no borders. Proxify's mission is to connect top developers around the world with opportunities they deserve. So, it doesn't matter where you are; we are here to help you fast-track your independent career in the right direction. üôÇ

Since our launch, Proxify's developers have successfully worked with 1200+ happy clients to build their products and growth features. 3500+ talented developers trust Proxify and its network to fulfil their dreams and objectives.

Proxify is shaped by a global network of supportive, talented developers interested in remote full-time jobs. Our Glassdoor (4.5/5) and Trustpilot (4.8/5) ratings reflect the trust developers place in us and our commitment to our members' success.

The Role:

We are looking for a Senior Mobile Cross-platform Developer with strong proficiency with Firebase for one of our clients. You are a perfect candidate if you are growth-oriented, you love what you do, and you enjoy working on new ideas to develop exciting products.

What we‚Äôre looking for:
‚Ä¢ Minimum of 5 years of experience in mobile application development with a strong portfolio of released applications.
‚Ä¢ Extensive experience with Firebase services and integrations in mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in mobile development frameworks and languages such as Flutter, React Native, Swift, Kotlin, and Java.
‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge of testing frameworks and debugging tools for mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with a proactive approach to identifying and resolving issues.

Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Design, develop, and maintain high-performance mobile applications for both iOS and Android platforms using Flutter, React Native, or native languages (Swift, Kotlin).
‚Ä¢ Implement and manage Firebase services such as Authentication, Firestore, Realtime Database, Cloud Functions, Cloud Messaging, and Crashlytics to enhance mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code with a focus on reusability and best practices. Conduct unit testing, integration testing, and end-to-end testing to ensure application stability and performance.
‚Ä¢ Identify and troubleshoot performance bottlenecks in mobile applications and optimise for maximum performance and user experience.

What Proxify offers
‚Ä¢ Career-accelerating positions at cutting-edge companies
‚Ä¢ Discover exclusive long-term remote engagements at the world's most interesting product companies.
‚Ä¢ Hand-picked opportunities, just for you
‚Ä¢ Skip the typical recruitment roadblocks and biases with personally matched engagements.
‚Ä¢ Fast-track your independent developer career
‚Ä¢ Start small and gain more freedom to take on new engagements as you build your independent developer career.
‚Ä¢ A recruitment process that values your time
‚Ä¢ Only one hiring process with the possibility of several positions, without any additional tests.

This offer from "Proxify" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 77% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Flutter Developer
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: European Union

Who we are
We‚Äôre an award-winning development agency at the heart of Vilnius City with clients all around the world. Being a premier development agency we only work for the best, with the best. We specialize in web & mobile development and bespoke UX/UI design. No matter how big or small our client‚Äôs organization and budgets are, we‚Äôve got a solution for them. This means you have a chance to work with both small and medium-sized businesses. We also provide outsourcing & outstaffing services to our clients.
What we are looking for
Looking for a Flutter developer for a full-time job as a contractor in our clients team.

Day to Day
‚Ä¢ Flutter application development
‚Ä¢ Working together with other developers, project manager and UX/UI designer to build smooth & scalable app
‚Ä¢ Learn best software development practises with your colleagues
‚Ä¢ Contribute to quality by identifying spots of improvements
‚Ä¢ Experience with REST API, HTTPS
You are someone who has...
‚Ä¢ At least 2 years experience as a Software Developer
‚Ä¢ At least 2 year experience with Flutter SDK and Dart language
‚Ä¢ Rich experience in different screens layouting/supporting
‚Ä¢ Experience in building at least 1 Android and/ or iOS application using Flutter
‚Ä¢ Understanding and experience with state-management patterns: Provider, BLoC / MobX
‚Ä¢ Strong experience with Git / Git Flow
‚Ä¢ Strong communication, problem-solving skills
‚Ä¢ Fluency in English language
‚Ä¢ Experience (as an advantage) with Flutter for Web, Flutter for Desktop/ Flutter Platform Channels; in Android development (Android SDK)/ iOS development (Xcode, iOS SDK); with Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban)
Why you‚Äôll love working with Scale3C
‚Ä¢ Work with some of the world‚Äôs leading and most recognized brands
‚Ä¢ Have the opportunity to work 100% remote from any country around Europe
‚Ä¢ Office in Vilnius city center
‚Ä¢ Cool and vibrant work environmentInterested in the position? We are looking forward to your application, to connect and talk more!

Best regards,
Talent acquisition team
